title: Hillary Clinton concerned about Russia tampering in U.S. elections
text: Hillary Clinton concerned about Russia tampering in U.S. elections Tuesday, 6 September 2016 ( Clinton Likens Trump's Nomination To A Turtle On A Fencepost 01:46 On Monday, Hillary Clinton expressed “a very serious” concern about Russia’s apparent tampering with the U.S. election. According to Politico, she implied that Vladimir Putin and the "adversarial foreign power" he governs are actively trying to elect Donald Trump. Clinton spoke with reporters... Recent related news Some US media outlets have reported the American intelligence agencies are investigating potential Russian interference in US elections. Zee News Mrs. Clinton stopped short of saying that President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia wanted Donald J. Trump to be elected, but delivered a harsh assessment of his... NYTimes.com Hillary Clinton has hinted that Russia might have interfered with the US election process to try to help Donald Trump. euronews Setting the stage on Labour Day for a critical month in their testy presidential campaign, Donald Trump softened his stance on immigration while Hillary Clinton... canoe.ca Setting the stage on Labour Day for a critical month in their testy presidential campaign, Donald Trump softened his stance on immigration while Hillary Clinton... CBC.ca White House hopeful Hillary Clinton expressed "grave" concern about reports that Russia has been interfering in the US electoral process through invasive cyber... News24 Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton addressed a report in the Washington Post Monday saying U.S. intelligence agencies are investigating potential...
